  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Depuradores verdes</string>
            <string language="en">Green sewage plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grüne Abwasserbetriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines vertes d'eaux d'égout</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas verdes do sewage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante verdi delle acque luride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράσινες εγκαταστάσεις λυμάτων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Treball de recerca sobre la contaminació de l'aigua i la depuració i tractament d'aigües residuals amb la utilització de diversos tipus vegetals. 1r premi (ESO) del 10è concurs de webs de ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">Research activity on water pollution and the treatment of waste water using certain types of plants. First prize (secondary schools) in the 10th science webpage competition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">protecció del medi ambient</string>
            <string language="en">environmental protection</string>
            <string language="es">protección del medio ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gestió de residus</string>
            <string language="en">waste management</string>
            <string language="es">gestión de residuos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">contaminació de l'aigua</string>
            <string language="en">water pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung Aktivität auf Wasserverunreinigung und
die Behandlung des Abwassers mit bestimmten Typen der Betriebe. 
Erster Preis (Sekundärschulen) in der 10. Wissenschaft Webseite
Konkurrenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité de recherches sur la pollution de l'eau
et le traitement des eaux résiduaires en utilisant certains types 
d'usines. Premier prix (écoles secondaires) en 10ème 
concurrence de page Web de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade da pesquisa na poluição da água e o 
tratamento da água waste usando determinados tipos de plantas. 
Primeiro prêmio (escolas secundárias) na 10o competição do 
Web page da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività di ricerca su inquinamento dell'acqua 
ed il trattamento di acque di rifiuto usando determinati tipi di 
piante. Primo premio (scuole secondarie) nella decima 
concorrenza di Web page di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνητική δραστηριότητα στη ρύπανση των υδάτων και η 
επεξεργασία των υγρών αποβλήτων που χρησιμοποιούν ορισμένους 
τύπους εγκαταστάσεων. Πρώτο βραβείο (δευτεροβάθμια 
εκπαίδευση) στο 10ο ανταγωνισμό webpage επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umweltschutz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abfallwirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserverunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">protection de l'environnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gestion des déchets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pollution de l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">proteção ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gerência waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poluição da água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">protezione dell'ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gestione dei rifiuti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inquinamento dell'acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προστασία του περιβάλλοντος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαχείριση των αποβλήτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρύπανση των υδάτων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
